# image

**Instance Property**

The image displayed on the button.

## Declaration

```swift
var image: UIImage { get }
```

## Discussion

When creating a grid button, don’t provide an animated image. If you do, the button uses the first image in the animation sequence.

## Obtaining Grid Button Information

- **titleVariants**: An array of title variants for the button.

items.description: An array of title variants for the button.
